pages.text: $(li)The Redstone Lamp is a block that produces light when receives a redstone signal.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/lit_redstone_lamp)Lit Redstone Lamp$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:redstone/crumbs/wood_lanterns)Wood Lanterns$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
